cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology on June 16, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3952, NOAA Chief Scientist Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 105 (Wednesday, June 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SHERRILL:
H.R. 3952.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of Section 8 or Article 1 of the Constitution of
the United States of America.
[Page H2893]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: NOAA Chief Scientist Act
